VASSAL.tools.image

Interface ImageTileSource

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ImageTileDiskCache

    public interface ImageTileSource
    An interface for classes which supply image tiles.
    Since:
    3.2.0

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

      java.awt.image.BufferedImage getTile(java.lang.String name, int tileX, int tileY, double scale)
      Gets an image tile.

      Gets the size of an image tile.

    • Method Detail

      • getTile

        java.awt.image.BufferedImage getTile(java.lang.String name,
                                     int tileX,
                                     int tileY,
                                     double scale)
                              throws ImageIOException
        Gets an image tile.
        Parameters:
        name - the image name
        tileX - the X coordinate of the tile
        tileY - the Y coordinate of the tile
        scale - the scale of the tile
        Returns:
        the tile
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if the tile can't be read
        ImageIOException
